## About

Compass Plus is a client-side mod that adds a fancy little compass HUD that shows the cardinal directions, the world spawn, and lodestones depending on the compasses in your inventory.

![Screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ModdingPlus/CompassPlus/1.18.x/docs/screenshot.png)

## Planned Features

* add support for the new compass type in 1.19
* show the direction where treasure maps lead
